website_summaries.verdict: A thin, triple wireless charging pad that is compatible with Qi-enabled smartphones as well as Apple's AirPods Pro.
pros: Make IT Simple's device offers three wireless charging locations with each spot delivering up to 10 watts of power
This model also features technology to help protect your smartphone against overcharging and overheating
cons: The current version of this model does not support the charging of Apple watches

customer_reviews.title: Fanciest wireless charging pad!
customer_reviews.text: Fanciest wireless charging pad! this charging pad is made out of leather and looks great on my desk! I can charge up to 3 phones at the time! simple to care and super quick charging! such a simple charging device that also looks and feels more expensive than what it is! great investment!
customer_reviews.author: MediaBoxEnt

customer_reviews.title: Fast and sleek!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pad. I’m glad I got it. It’s fast and very convenient. The watch charger is built in.
customer_reviews.author: Melody O. Muller

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Got this product nervous it wasn't going to work because it was cheaper than most wireless chargers. But was I wrong. I have been using it for a week and complete love it. I would recommend this product to anyone and the design is durable and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey C.

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: I’m super satisfied with the product. Charges my iPhone 11 Pro, my Apple wat h and my wife’s iPhone 11.
customer_reviews.author: Sheldon Browne

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use but the design is flawed somehow I had my first one for 6 months and then it just stopped working so I bought a new one it worked once then that one also broke I ended returning it for refund
customer_reviews.author: Dakar

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Works great, just had a little issue with the apple watch not always working, had to push down on it a bit sometimes not a big deal
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son who travels. He was tired of carrying all of his chargers. He purchased another one for home.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for multiple devices
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for bedside use! No more long wires for multiple phones and I watch cords.
customer_reviews.author: LST

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: I can charge multiple items at once but make sure your Apple Watch is laying flat.
customer_reviews.author: Theophilus

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I have not had any problems with it at all
customer_reviews.author: Debra Whitman

customer_reviews.title: Good but didn’t last! Too good to be true!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great in our kitchen but stopped working after 3 months. VERY bummed!!
customer_reviews.author: Edie Thompson

customer_reviews.title: This item is a great wireless charging station
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this item and not only because it works good because it charges fast and is easy to charge. All you do is just put it in the center of the circle and it charges! It also charges faster when there is one device on there, but it still charges pretty fast with all three.
customer_reviews.author: Nuvo worker

product_meta.title: Wireless Charging pad (3×10W), Leather Wireless Charging Station for Multiple Devices Compatible Dual iPhone11 Pro Max XR, Galaxy Series &All QI Enabled Phones (Adapter incloud)
feature_bullets: 【Premium & Stylish Design】Designed with Leather surface, not only provides sleek and modern style,Charge your iPhone +New AirPods2 Together with ONLY one charging cable, which makes your room or desk more simple and neat. Perfect gift for iPhone fans.

【Multi-Device Wireless Charging pad】3 x10W wireless charging pad supports 3 Qi-Enabled phones to be charged simultaneously,charge three mobile phone at the same time with fast speed. Charge the New iPhones and New Airpods2 (Not Support Apple Watch).

【Compatible Device】Compatible with iPhone11/11 Pro/11 Pro Max/Xs MAX/XR/XS/X/8/8Plus/Airpods2, Galaxy Note 10/Note 10 Plus/S10 Plus/S10E/Note 8/S8/S8 Plus,S7/S7 Edge and all Qi-enabled devices. IMPORTNAT.

【Important Notice】Good wireless charger are not depend how many coils, it's depend the charging efficiency,the smart wireless charger should detect your phone and give reasonable charging.PLEASE NOTE THAT CHARGING WITH PHONE CASE NO MORE THAN 4MM,THE CASE WITHOUT ANY IRON,METAL.COINS,IC CARDS,BANK CARDS,MAGNETIC ABSORBERS ON CHARGING AREA.
【What You Get and Warranty】1 x Wireless Charger Pad, 1 x 30W Adapter, 1 x User Guide, 12-Months no hassle full refund and exchange warranty backed by 24 Hour Service.
